#summary The Progressbar widget renders a HTML progressbar.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

Take a look at the [http://www.weinfreund.de/struts2-jquery-showcase/index.action Showcase] to see what this tag provides.


= Samples =

==Simple Progressbar==
{{{
<sj:progressbar id="progressbar" value="33"/>
}}}

==Resizeable Progressbar. ==
{{{
<sj:effectDiv id="progressbarWrapper" resizable="true" cssStyle="height:30px;" cssClass="ui-widget-default">
  <sj:progressbar id="progressbarresize" value="21" change="change" cssStyle="height: 100%;"/>
</sj:effectDiv>
}}}
